plot: In a flashback a man recalls the first days of his marriage in Paris when his ex-wife proposes him to visit and meet his son whom he left behind the day he left his wife and home.
title: Carta de París
plot_es: In a flashback a man recalls the first days of his marriage in Paris when his ex-wife proposes him to visit and meet his son whom he left behind the day he left his wife and home.
plot_en: In a flashback a man recalls the first days of his marriage in Paris when his ex-wife proposes him to visit and meet his son whom he left behind the day he left his wife and home.
